mapper.select: SELECT * FROM Clients LEFT JOIN ClientsContracts ON ClientsContracts.id=Clients.clientsContractsId WHERE Clients.id=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Clients(firstName, secondName, lastName, birthday, gender, isBan, signIn) VALUES(#{firstName}, #{secondName}, #{lastName}, #{birthday}, #{gender}, #{isBan}, #{signIn})
mapper.update: UPDATE Clients SET firstName=#{firstName}, secondName=#{secondName}, lastName=#{lastName}, birthday=#{birthday}, gender=#{gender}, isBan=#{isBan}, signIn=#{signIn} WHERE id=#{id}
